channel.title: How do i make a client connect to my servers ip instantly?
channel.description:
pretty self-explanatory question
you know how when clients just automatically connect to an ip adress? i have the khanz ip changer for my 562 server, but id like to know how to make it so i dont have to enter the ip adress everytime, basically, you click run and the client starts up and connects to my server. how would i make it do that?

item.title: How do i make a client connect to my servers ip instantly?
item.dc:creator: @mrx_dodian mrx dodian
item.description:
@mrx_dodian wrote:

Oh lol never worked with a 562 thought they were the same.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a client connect to my servers ip instantly?
item.dc:creator: @zRoflak zRoflak
item.description:
@zRoflak wrote:

there is no gui.java. does that mean i need to find another ip changer? and if so, do you know of one i can use that has gui.java?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a client connect to my servers ip instantly?

item.title: How do i make a client connect to my servers ip instantly?
item.dc:creator: @mrx_dodian mrx dodian
item.description:
@mrx_dodian wrote:

go into gui.java and “ctrl f” or search “server =” if that doesent work just search “server” there should be a ip on one of them (one of the ones you find) replace it with yours

Then right click edit your run.bat and copy what it says and what it says here

Read full topic
